In collaboration with LIQID, I had the pleasure of partnering with FOMO247 to host an exclusive dinner ğŸ½ at the Quantum Galerie. We welcomed 20 carefully selected high-profile guests for an intimate evening of open discussions about money ğŸ’°. ğŸ¤¯ This exclusive event was 250% oversubscribed, highlighting the strong interest in uniting exceptional individuals from the venture and tech scenes. We specifically focused on founders who have already experienced successful exits and Angels with short- and long-term experience. ğğ®ğ­ ğ©ğ¢ğœğ­ğ®ğ«ğğ¬ ğœğšğ§ ğ¬ğšğ² ğ¦ğ¨ğ«ğ ğ­ğ¡ğšğ§ ğš ğ­ğ¡ğ¨ğ®ğ¬ğšğ§ğ ğ°ğ¨ğ«ğğ¬, ğ¬ğ¨ ğ¢ğ§ğ¬ğ­ğğšğ ğ¨ğŸ ğğ±ğ©ğ¥ğšğ¢ğ§ğ¢ğ§ğ  ğ°ğ¡ğ² ğ­ğ¡ğ¢ğ¬ ğ°ğšğ¬ ğšğ§ğ¨ğ­ğ¡ğğ« ğšğ¦ğšğ³ğ¢ğ§ğ  ğğ¯ğğ§ğ­, ğ£ğ®ğ¬ğ­ ğœğ¡ğğœğ¤ ğ¨ğ®ğ­ ğ¨ğ®ğ« ğ ğ«ğğšğ­ ğ©ğ¡ğ¨ğ­ğ¨ğ¬ ğŸ˜. The greatest impact drivers in our lives are often others; we just need the opportunity to meet them. Thank you, GÃ¼lsah Wilke, for spreading the word and helping me ensure our dining table is diverse enough! So, if you enjoy bringing amazing people together or want access to these networks, feel free to reach out to me! 700+ registrations for our first FOMO Berlin's After-work event! Here's why it was magical. FOMO247 ğŸŒŸ We did it! ğŸŒŸ Bringing the vibrant spirit of Cape Town's First Thursday to Berlin was a dream come true. Our first event, FOMO Berlin's "First Thursday CPT x Berlin Edition (Fashion Week)," was an incredible success with 700+ registrations! The energy was electric and the location stunning. We gathered investors, founders, and tech operators for a new kind of after-work event that also felt like a Cape Town reunion. This event was not purely business-focused, nor was it solely social networking; it was something in between. It was about creating a space for new connections to flourish. Highlights: ğŸ“ Venue: P61 Gallery GmbH gallery, a perfect match for our Cape Town vibe. ğŸ¨ Local art exhibition, adding a unique Berlin touch. ğŸ‘— Dress code to set the tone and ensure commitment.
